graph_title: Percentage of women and girls aged 16 to 59 subjected to sexual assault
indicator_available: Percentage of women and girls aged 16 to 59 subjected to sexual assault
indicator_name: Proportion of women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to sexual violence by persons other than an intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by age and place of occurrence
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 5: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 5.2: Eliminate all forms of violence against all women and girls in the public and private spheres, including trafficking and sexual and other types of exploitation
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 5.2.2: Proportion of women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to sexual violence by persons other than an intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by age and place of occurrence
SDG_CUSTODIAN_AGENCIES__GLOBAL: United Nations Children’s Emergency Fund (UNICEF), The United Nations Entity for Gender Equality and the Empowerment of Women (UN Women), United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA), World Health Organization (WHO), United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC)
SDG_GOAL: Goal 5: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
SDG_TARGET: Target 5.2: Eliminate all forms of violence against all women and girls in the public and private spheres, including trafficking and sexual and other types of exploitation
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 5.2.2: Proportion of women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to sexual violence by persons other than an intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by age and place of occurrence
STAT_CONC_DEF: Sexual violence for this data refers to any sexual violence, including attempts.
SOURCE_TYPE:
[Sexual offences - appendix tables](https://www.ons.gov.uk/peoplepopulationandcommunity/crimeandjustice/datasets/sexualoffencesappendixtables)

[Percentage of adults aged 16 to 59 who were victims of sexual assault (including attempts) in the last year, by selected personal or household characteristics and sex, year ending March 2018, CSEW](https://www.ons.gov.uk/peoplepopulationandcommunity/crimeandjustice/adhocs/10458percentageofadultsaged16to59whowerevictimsofsexualassaultincludingattemptsinthelastyearbyselectedpersonalorhouseholdcharacteristicsandsexyearendingmarch2018csew)
REC_USE_LIM:
Due to disaggregation not available at the local level, this data represents the North West of England as opposed to Liverpool.

This indicator is being used as an approximation of the UN SDG Indicator. Where possible, we will work to identify or develop UK data to meet the global indicator specification. This indicator has been identified in collaboration with topic experts.
source_url_text_2: ONS - Percentage of adults aged 16 to 59 who were victims of sexual assault (including attempts) in the last year, by selected personal or household characteristics and sex, year ending March 2018, CSEW
